ygData.subject: RE: Woohoo...
ygData.msgSnippet: I, for one, can not believe that they didn t create another object (i.e. new sketch, old sketch), and just trash the old one... I mean, if they had anyone in
ygData.messageBody:
I, for one, can not believe that they didn't create another object (i.e. new
sketch, old sketch), and just trash the old one... I mean, if they had
anyone in their employ reading any of the forums on the popular sites they
would have know this was going to happen.

I know of people who were not even potters who bought 10-16 backpacks full
of sketches.... Talk about too much cash in the economy...

-----Original Message-----
From: LordSeraph@... [mailto:LordSeraph@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 10:56 AM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Potters] Woohoo...

<< one question. is this a bannable exploit? will Verant take away all the
plat we made in selling these sketches? i know that they monitor all
purchases, which is how they know if potions are being bought or not. >>

I don't understand how this can be a bannable exploit...I call it...an
investment. It was a risk...it wasn't a 100% guarantee that it would work.
Would you feel guilty to find out that tomorrow each sheet of toilet paper
in
your house was worth 100 dollars? Would you sell it or use it? heh...
